title: 服务器崩溃，求解决
author: Re为
txt_content:
31.07 16:57:02 [服务器] ERROR 3: ASM: mods.flammpfeil.slashblade.ability.JustGuard@4c1259fc LivingHurtEvent(Lnet/minecraftforge/event/entity/living/LivingHurtEvent;)V31.07 16:57:02 [服务器] ERROR 2: ASM: thaumcraft.common.lib.events.EventHandlerRunic@fdbb6f0 entityHurt(Lnet/minecraftforge/event/entity/living/LivingHurtEvent;)V31.07 16:57:02 [服务器] ERROR 1: ASM: noppes.npcs.ServerEventsHandler@318f9f17 invoke(Lnet/minecraftforge/event/entity/living/LivingHurtEvent;)V31.07 16:57:02 [服务器] ERROR 0: NORMAL31.07 16:57:02 [服务器] ERROR Index: 4 Listeners:

31.07 16:57:02 [服务器] ERROR Exception caught during firing event net.minecraftforge.event.entity.living.LivingHurtEvent@1c1f6b44:
31.07 16:55:20 [服务器] WARN Error occured during retriving version

如何解决，服务器有时候会崩溃重启

mod：工业，神秘，拔刀

replies.author: andylizi
replies.txt_content: Thaumic Tinkerer 这个mod的BUG，尝试更新一下版本，如果更新了还是不行只能找mod作者，或者删除这个mod

replies.author: ucai
replies.txt_content: 请给出服务端crash-reports下最新的崩溃日志。

replies.author: Re为
replies.txt_content:
